overview:
Glenn Creamer is a Senior Managing Director of Providence Equity.

Mr. Creamer is currently a director of CDW, Medical Media Holdings and Telcordia Technologies. Prior to the founding of Providence in 1989, Mr. Creamer was a Vice President of Narragansett Capital, which he joined in 1988. He was involved in Narragansett Capitalâ€™s broadcasting, newspaper publishing and cable television investments. Prior to this, Mr. Creamer worked in investment banking at Merrill Lynch and J.P. Morgan.

Mr. Creamer received a Master of Business Administration from Harvard Business School and a Bachelor of Arts from Brown University. Mr. Creamer is a director of Mustard Seed Communities and the Rhode Island School of Design Museum and serves as Vice Chairman of Catholic Relief Services Foundation.
